welcome.notLoggedIn: Welcome to the Daily Coding Challenge!
welcome.description: Level up your programming skills with daily coding challenges. Compete with other developers, learn new algorithms and data structures, and climb the leaderboard to become a coding pro. Join our community and start your coding journey today!

dailyChallenges.title: Daily Challenges
dailyChallenges.description: Get a new coding problem every day.

moreChallenges.title: More Challenges
moreChallenges.description: Take on personalized challenges to improve your coding skills. Discover what you're capable of!

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: See how you stack up against other coders.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Learn more about our mission and team.

faqSupport.title: FAQ & Support
faqSupport.description: Find answers to common questions and get help.

newsItem1.title: New!
newsItem1.description: Festive themed challenges for the holiday season. Get in the spirit and code your way to some holiday cheer!

newsItem2.title: Update!
newsItem2.description: Festive themed for the web app & extension. Get in the spirit and code your way to some holiday cheer!

supportUs.title: Support Us
supportUs.description: Help us keep the Daily Coding Challenge running and growing. Your donation will help us create new challenges, improve the platform, and support our community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? Contact our support team.

checkCode.title: Check your code once you have completed it

messages.maxCharacters: The maximum character limit of {{maxCharacters}} has been reached.

messages.pressToMark: Press to mark your exercise as completed
messages.scoreMult:
Score multiplier:
- Easy: 1.0
- Intermediate: 1.5
- Hard: 2.0
- Extreme: 2.5
Final score will be normalized from 0 to 10.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about our mission, vision, and the team behind Daily Code Challenge.
about.missionDescription: At Daily Code Challenge, our mission is to provide programmers with engaging and challenging problems that enhance their skills daily.

progress.subtitle: Here’s a snapshot of your achievements and activities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What is the Daily Code Challenge?
faq.answer1: The Daily Code Challenge is a platform where you can practice coding problems every day to improve your programming skills.
faq.answer2: To participate, simply log in and start solving the daily challenges. You can submit your solutions and see how you rank against other participants.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to contact us using the form below.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.loginWarning: Please log in to send a message.
contact.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again later.

donate.title: Support Us
donate.description: If you enjoy using our platform and would like to support us, you can make a donation via PayPal.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to our Privacy Policy. Your privacy is critically important to us. We value your trust and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacyPolicy.dataCollection: We collect various types of information in connection with the services we provide, including:
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionItem1: Personal identification information (Name, email address, etc.)
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionItem2: Usage data (Pages visited, time spent on the site, etc.)
privacyPolicy.dataUse: We use the collected data for various purposes, including:
privacyPolicy.dataUseItem1: To provide and maintain our service
privacyPolicy.dataUseItem2: To notify you about changes to our service
privacyPolicy.dataSharing: We may share your information in the following situations:
privacyPolicy.dataSharingItem1: With service providers to perform service-related tasks
privacyPolicy.dataSecurity: We prioritize the security of your data and use commercially acceptable means to protect it. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.cookies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our service and hold certain information.
privacyPolicy.yourRights: You have the right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you. Please contact us to exercise these rights.
privacyPolicy.contact: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us at

termsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsConditions.introduction: Welcome to our Terms and Conditions. By using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.
termsConditions.use: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes. You agree not to take any action that might compromise the security of the site, render the site inaccessible to others, or otherwise cause damage to the site or its content.
termsConditions.useItem1: You must not misuse our services.
termsConditions.useItem2: You must not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our services.
termsConditions.useItem3: You must not use our services to harm others.
termsConditions.userResponsibilities: As a user of our services, you are responsible for any activity that occurs through your account.
termsConditions.userResponsibilitiesItem1: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
termsConditions.userResponsibilitiesItem2: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
termsConditions.userResponsibilitiesItem3: You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
termsConditions.intellectualProperty: All content included in our services, such as text, graphics, logos, and images, is our property or the property of our licensors and is protected by copyright and other laws.
termsConditions.termination: We may terminate or suspend your access to our services immediately, without prior notice, if you breach these terms and conditions.
termsConditions.disclaimer: Our services are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy or completeness of our services.
termsConditions.changes: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting.
termsConditions.contact: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at

footer.description: Daily Code Challenge is your daily grind to become a better programmer. Crush challenges, climb the leaderboard, and join our developer community!
